title: Love Island's India takes mind off Ovie split as she hangs with Amber
text:
Love Island’s Amber Gill hangs out with freshly single India Reynolds (Pictures: Backgrid)

Love Island’s India Reynolds has touched down in London after jetting off to France with her reality bestie, Amber Gill.

The 28-year-old appears to be trying to take her mind off her recent split from Ovie Soko, who she met in the villa.

And it seems to be working, as she was all smiles when returning home with the winner of this year’s competition.

Strolling through Kings Cross station, the duo looked all fresh-faced as they beamed at the camera following their getaway.

Amber was all wrapped up in a white fleece jacket, which she’d matched with a pair of leather-look trousers and a flannel shirt.

While her buddy had also opted to keep warm in black tracksuit bottoms and an oversized jumper.

She looked all fresh-faced (Picture: Backgrid)

Despite recently breaking up with her beau, India looked in high spirits as she was pictured grinning from ear to ear.

The star confirmed their separation at the Pride Of Britain Awards, and also wrote a cryptic message in her latest Instagram stories.

Alluding to negative comments she’s received since the split, India said hours after the reports broke: ‘It’s free to be kind… Think before you type… Thank you x.’

On Saturday, an insider told the MailOnline that the loved up pair decided to ‘amicably’ go their separate ways after struggling to find time to see each other.

India was smiled despite recently splitting from Ovie Soko (Picture: Backgrid)

The duo first met in the Love Island villa (Picture: Rex)

Ovie’s fame has skyrocketed since leaving the dating show as he landed an ASOS deal while also bagging a spot on Sky Sports as an NBA analyst.

Meanwhile, India has been jet-setting all around Europe for lingerie modelling shoots.

It was recently rumoured that the grid girl had attended her ex-boyfriend Kieran Gibbs’ birthday party – however, Ovie shot down cheating speculation when talking to Metro.co.uk.

At the time, he told us: ‘Me and India are really good. You know, everything is good, I really can’t complain…

‘India’s great man, she’s an absolute sweetheart. We’re absolutely fine, we’re happy.

‘We’re moving and taking positive steps and trying as much as possible to just mind our business and get on with our relationship. But India’s she’s really good.’
